resources.name: gemini-2-5-pro-model-card
resources.title: Gemini 2.5 Pro Model Card
resources.description: Official model card PDF for Gemini 2.5 Pro, describing model architecture, capabilities, safety, limitations, and benchmark results.

resources.name: gemini-2-5-flash-model-card
resources.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash Model Card
resources.description: Official model card PDF for Gemini 2.5 Flash, covering the lighter, faster Gemini variant including model capabilities, use cases, and limitations.

resources.name: imagen-4-model-card
resources.title: Imagen 4 Model Card
resources.description: Official model card PDF for Imagen 4, DeepMind's advanced text-to-image diffusion model, covering model design, data, capabilities, and limitations.

resources.name: deepmind-gemini-robotics-on-device-model-card
resources.title: DeepMind Gemini Robotics On-Device Model Card
resources.description: Official model card PDF for Gemini Robotics On-Device (DeepMind), detailing architecture, deployment, safety considerations, performance benchmarks, and use-case guidance for running robotics models on device.
